verses.roman:
caitanya-gosāñira līlā--amṛtera dhāra
sarvendriya tṛpta haya śravaṇe yāhāra

synonyms: caitanya-gosāñira līlā—the pastimes of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; amṛtera dhāra—drops of nectar; sarva-indriya—all senses; tṛpta—satisfied; haya—become; śravaṇe—by hearing; yāhāra—of them all.
translation: The nectarean drops of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's pastimes can satisfy the senses of everyone who hears them.
